1.title: Liver Hole
1.plot: Millions of makes and breaks. Loads of lands and slams. Special guest slammers Danny Supa, Elf, Jessy Whaley, Darrell Stanton, and Johnny Miller.

2.title: Keg on It
2.plot: Tons of thrills and spills. Millions of makes and breaks. Special guest slammers Ethan Loy, Jackson Ratima, Justin Bennee, Gerald Norman, and Emmanuel Guzman.

3.title: On the Couch
3.plot: Tons of thrills and spills. Heaps of whamies and wipeouts. Special guest slammers Chris Grenier, Dan Drehobl, John John Florence, and Dennis Enarson.

4.title: Taste of Glory
4.plot: A bunch of ouchies and boo boos with no kiss to make it feel better. Special guest slammers John Peacy, Dave Abair, JP Tomich, and Lizard King.

6.title: Scorpion Style
6.plot: Tons of thrills and spills. Millions of makes and breaks. Loads of lands and slams.

7.title: Power Bomb
7.plot: Millions of makes and breaks . Loads of lands and slams.

8.title: Session Over
8.plot: Millions of makes and breaks. Loads of lands and slams.

imdb.plot outline: Week after week, SLAM! delivers you the most ruthless crashes and mishaps in all of sports. Whether it's surfers getting swallowed up by monster waves, skateboarders landing spread-eagle on rails, or freestyle motocross riders ejecting from 100 ft. dirt jumps, SLAM! showcases what happens when the most exciting sports in the world go terribly wrong. Professional daredevil and crash aficionado, Chris "Slam" Lambert, walks us through the spills that made history, having victims reveal the dirty details, and throwing himself in harm's way when least expected. But SLAM! isn't just about concussions and broken bones, it's about comebacks and the will of the most dedicated athletes on the planet to persevere. SLAM! will smack you upside the head, knock you off your feet, and have you asking "Please sir, may I have another?"
